CustomField.formula: AND( OR( AND(Create_1_Week_Follow_up_Task__c, NOT(X1_Week_Follow_up_Task_Created__c)), AND(Create_2_Weeks_Follow_up_Task__c, NOT(X2_Weeks_Follow_up_Task_Created__c)), No_One_Month_Activity__c ), TEXT(Status) <> $Label.Lead_Status_Qualified, TEXT(Status) <> $Label.Lead_Status_Unqualified )
CustomField.label: Is Task Scheduler Eligible
